text: If you accept the argument for a hereditary monarchy under which we all are subjects then I'm afraid you're also going to have to accept the reality the heir to the throne is going to get a Coronavirus test before you do. It's either that or a Republic. Sorry.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Boris Johnson to make a statement to the nation
Government asks for 250,000 volunteers to support the NHS as UK deaths spike
